<?php
require '/wordpress/wp-load.php';

// Ensure uploads directory exists
$upload_dir = wp_upload_dir();
wp_mkdir_p($upload_dir['path']);

// Download the video
$video_url = 'https://n8e0ka87m9.gdcdn.us/vo15od683f/rtcamp-video-1-orignal.mp4';
$video_path = $upload_dir['path'] . '/rtcamp-video.mp4';

$response = wp_remote_get($video_url, array('timeout' => 300));

if (!is_wp_error($response) && wp_remote_retrieve_response_code($response) === 200) {
    $success = file_put_contents($video_path, wp_remote_retrieve_body($response));
    
    if ($success) {
        echo 'Video downloaded successfully!';
        
        // Create attachment
        $attachment_data = array(
            'post_title' => 'rtCamp Demo Video',
            'post_content' => '',
            'post_status' => 'inherit',
            'post_mime_type' => 'video/mp4'
        );
        $attachment_id = wp_insert_attachment($attachment_data, $video_path);
        
        if (!is_wp_error($attachment_id)) {
            require_once(ABSPATH . 'wp-admin/includes/image.php');
            wp_generate_attachment_metadata($attachment_id, $video_path);
            
            echo ' Video added to Media Library! Attachment ID: ' . $attachment_id;
        }
    } else {
        echo 'Failed to save video file.';
    }
} else {
    echo 'Failed to download video from URL.';
}
